responseText: I know not how long the Sunfire Consortium will linger here in the ruins, but it may be until we've gathered enough allies to spread deep into the Sandsquall Desert. For now, we'll need to make due in the shadow of the old Kaelar Capital. If you'd like to be useful in the mean time, seek the commission board here or learn a trade. Take care to watch for goblins and other dangers beyond the pallisade.
name: DD_0100_SamiasHopeAmbassador_4_Response
